    • encrypt

      public org.forgerock.json.JsonValue encrypt(org.forgerock.json.JsonValue value, String cipher, String alias) throws org.forgerock.json.crypto.JsonCryptoException, org.forgerock.json.JsonException
      Description copied from interface: CryptoService
      Encrypts a JSON value.
      Specified by:
      encrypt in interface CryptoService
      Parameters:
      value - the JSON value to be encrypted.
      cipher - the cipher with which to encrypt the value.
      alias - the key alias in the key store with which to encrypt the value.
      Returns:
      a copy of the value, encrypted with the specified cipher and key.
      Throws:
      org.forgerock.json.crypto.JsonCryptoException - if and invalid cipher and/or alias is provided.
      org.forgerock.json.JsonException - if an exception occurred encrypting the value.

    • decrypt

      public org.forgerock.json.JsonValue decrypt(org.forgerock.json.JsonValue value) throws org.forgerock.json.JsonValueException
      Description copied from interface: CryptoService
      Decrypts a JSON value and all of its children.
      Specified by:
      decrypt in interface CryptoService
      Parameters:
      value - the JSON value to be decrypted.
      Returns:
      a deep copy of the value, with all values decrypted.
      Throws:
      org.forgerock.json.JsonValueException

    • decrypt

      public org.forgerock.json.JsonValue decrypt(String value) throws org.forgerock.json.JsonException
      Description copied from interface: CryptoService
      Decrypts a String if in a format supported by this service.
      Specified by:
      decrypt in interface CryptoService
      Parameters:
      value - the Stringified value to be decrypted.
      Returns:
      The decrypted structure value, with all values decrypted.
      Throws:
      org.forgerock.json.JsonException - if an exception occurred decrypting the value.

    • decryptIfNecessary

      public org.forgerock.json.JsonValue decryptIfNecessary(org.forgerock.json.JsonValue value) throws org.forgerock.json.JsonException
      Description copied from interface: CryptoService
      Decrypts a JSON value and all of its children if necessary. If not, returns the original object.

      Note that if the argument is null, this return a JsonValue wrapping null.

      Specified by:
      decryptIfNecessary in interface CryptoService
      Parameters:
      value - the JSON value to be decrypted.
      Returns:
      The structure value, decrypted if necessary.
      Throws:
      org.forgerock.json.JsonException - if an exception occurred decrypting the value.

    • decryptIfNecessary

      public org.forgerock.json.JsonValue decryptIfNecessary(String value) throws org.forgerock.json.JsonException
      Description copied from interface: CryptoService
      Decrypts a String if in a format supported by this service and is decryption is necessary. If decryption is unnecessary, it returns the structure value.

      Note that if the argument is null, this will return a JsonValue wrapping null.

      Specified by:
      decryptIfNecessary in interface CryptoService
      Parameters:
      value - the Stringified value to be decrypted.
      Returns:
      The structure value, decrypted if necessary.
      Throws:
      org.forgerock.json.JsonException - if an exception occurred decrypting the value.

    • isEncrypted

      public boolean isEncrypted(org.forgerock.json.JsonValue value)
      Description copied from interface: CryptoService
      Detects if a JSON value is encrypted in a format supported by this service.
      Specified by:
      isEncrypted in interface CryptoService
      Parameters:
      value - the JSON value to check.
      Returns:
      true if encrypted, false otherwise.

    • hash

      public org.forgerock.json.JsonValue hash(org.forgerock.json.JsonValue value, String algorithm) throws org.forgerock.json.JsonException, org.forgerock.json.crypto.JsonCryptoException
      Description copied from interface: CryptoService
      Hashes a JSON value. Generates a new salt value.
      Specified by:
      hash in interface CryptoService
      Parameters:
      value - the JSON value to be hashed.
      algorithm - the hashing algorithm to use.
      Returns:
      a copy of the value, hashed with the specified algorithm and salt.
      Throws:
      org.forgerock.json.JsonException - if an exception occurred encrypting the value.
      org.forgerock.json.crypto.JsonCryptoException

      Specified by:
      isHashed in interface CryptoService

    • matches

      public boolean matches(String plainTextValue, org.forgerock.json.JsonValue value) throws org.forgerock.json.crypto.JsonCryptoException
      Description copied from interface: CryptoService
      Returns true if the supplied plain text value of a field matches the supplied hashed value.
      Specified by:
      matches in interface CryptoService
      Parameters:
      plainTextValue - a String representing the plain text value of a field
      value - a JsonValue representing the hashed and encoded value of a field
      Returns:
      true if the fields values match, false otherwise.
      Throws:
      org.forgerock.json.crypto.JsonCryptoException
